questions.text: How do you primarily deal with challenges?

options.text: I confront them head-on.
I seek support or knowledge to address them.
I try to maintain harmony and balance.
I strive for success and want to be the best.
I stand up for what's right and have a strong sense of justice.
I desire control and to protect myself and my environment.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I enjoy helping others succeed and be recognized for their accomplishments.
I have a need to be different and unique from others, even if it means standing out.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I value achieving things and being recognized for my efforts.
I often retreat into deep thought, analyzing every detail.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I take pride in my ability to guide and assist others.
options.result: Type 8w2 - The Challenger with a Helper Wing

options.text: I appreciate introspection and often ponder over things deeply.

questions.text: What do you prioritize in life?

options.text: Being knowledgeable and competent.
Building strong, trusting relationships.
Feeling secure and having a clear guidance.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I enjoy assisting others and feel fulfilled when I can be of help.
I am often skeptical and question the intentions of others.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I have a strong sense of what's right and wrong and feel the need to correct injustices.
I like being in the spotlight and want to be appreciated for my efforts.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I constantly seek deeper understanding and often dive into introspection.
I have a supportive nature and often prioritize others' needs.

questions.text: What is more in line with your inner feelings?

options.text: I want to be unique and express my individuality.
I desire to have my needs met and to experience life to the fullest.
I wish for inner and outer peace, avoiding conflicts.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I often feel the weight of envy and sometimes feel misunderstood.
I have a desire to be recognized and can be very image-conscious.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I have a strong inclination towards planning and seek constant stimulation.
I appreciate depth and meaningful experiences in life.

questions.text: Which statement resonates more with you?

options.text: I believe in a moral code and often find myself striving for perfection.
I like to take charge of situations and can be assertive when needed.
